# Class Memory

Class for managing conversational memory in agents. Provides functionality to retrieve and update memory based on conversation history.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy get update

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this memory instance.

#### Returns void




### get

  * get(history: [History](./core_history.History), memorySnapshot: [MemorySnapshot](./primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshot)): Promise<string[]>

Retrieves memory content based on conversation history.

#### Parameters

    * history: [History](./core_history.History)

Conversation history to retrieve memory from

    * memorySnapshot: [MemorySnapshot](./primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshot)

Current memory snapshot

#### Returns Promise<string[]>

Promise resolving to array of memory strings




### update

  * update(  
history: [History](./core_history.History),  
memorySnapshot: [MemorySnapshot](./primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshot),  
): Promise<[MemorySnapshot](./primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshot)>

Updates memory content based on conversation history.

#### Parameters

    * history: [History](./core_history.History)

Conversation history to update memory with

    * memorySnapshot: [MemorySnapshot](./primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshot)

Current memory snapshot to update

#### Returns Promise<[MemorySnapshot](./primitives_memory_memory_snapshot.MemorySnapshot)>

Promise resolving to new memory snapshot
